description:
"I play basketball and football, I like hanging out with girls and my friends and you guys are pretty cool too," Justin said, the latter referring to our camera guys with whom he had been hanging out the prior evening.
That's pretty much how he summed himself up. He's a laid-back 19-year-old from the east coast who's kind of quiet.
When asked about showing his asshole, he didn't seem all that embarrassed.
"If I was going to do that," he said, referring to anal sex, "I'd be a pitcher definitely. I like to dominate the other guy."
title: Justin
